results.name: Triangle of number of permutations by barycenter.
comment: The barycenter or signcenter of a permutation is the sum of the signs of the difference between initial and final positions of the objects.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..20, flattened
example: (1,3,2,5,7,6,4) has difference (0,1,-1,1,2,0,-3) and signs (0,1,-1,1,1,0,-1) with total 1. This is one of 1289 such permutations of degree 7.
